metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1007 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Apache Struts 1.3.10allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) thename parameter to struts-examples/upload/upload-submit.do, or the messageparameter to (2) struts-cookbook/processSimple.do or (3)struts-cookbook/processDyna.do.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
